CustomField.description: Concurrency level for conversational agents: Low (Queueable for sequential processing), High (Platform Events for concurrent, multi-user chat). Ignored for Batch/Email agents which always use Queueables.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Conversational agents: choose Low for single-user scenarios, High for multi-user concurrent chats. Batch and Email agents ignore this setting.
CustomField.label: Concurrency
